short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always keep track of the best prices & promos when shopping online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you are browsing items on e-commerce websites, you don't need to manually search the items to make sure you get the cheapest price anymore.

By clicking on the CheapMax icon, we will search and display same or similar items on popular e-commerce websites, so you can locate the best deal & decide which one to buy!

Right now we support Shopee, Lazada, Flipkart & Amazon.in - more website support will come soon :)

Disclaimer: All the information are from internet. Please double check item description, size, shipping cost & other information to evaluate deal offerings.
